title: Hominus
content:
I like the font Hominus by paul lloyd

see - [http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/img/hominis.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090423/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/img/hominis.gif)

Anyone know of similar fonts?
author: chrisjleenet

comments.content:
_Even_ ‘ [Copperplate](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090423/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=Copperplate)’, _by Frederic W Goudy_, _may get you close_..  
_( With manually added shading.. )_

_Edit-A-Bit.: One more.:_ ‘ [Shady Lady](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090423/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/shady-lady-nf/)’, _by [Nick Curtis](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Nick%20Curtis)_..

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090423/http:/www.formlos.net/)
